description: This file contains unit tests for the IntegrationService class in a Java backend application. It uses JUnit 5 and Mockito to test methods related to listing all integrations and connecting a user to an integration.

classes.name: IntegrationServiceTest
classes.description: A JUnit 5 test class for testing the IntegrationService methods.

methods.name: listAll_mapsResponses
methods.description: Tests that the listAll method returns a list of IntegrationResponse objects correctly mapped from Integration entities.

methods.name: connect_createsOrUpdatesUserIntegration
methods.description: Tests that the connect method correctly creates or updates a UserIntegration record when connecting a user to an integration.
